name: Altius Renewable Royalties Corp.
longDescription: Altius Renewable Royalties Corp is a renewable energy royalty company whose business is to invest in renewable power developers and originators. The company's long-term strategy is to gain exposure to revenue underlying renewable energy operations by acquiring and managing a portfolio of diversified renewable energy royalties including acquiring royalties and other interests directly from project originators, developers, operators, and third-party holders of existing royalties.
fulldescription: Altius Renewable Royalties Corp is a renewable energy royalty company whose business is to invest in renewable power developers and originators. The company's long-term strategy is to gain exposure to revenue underlying renewable energy operations by acquiring and managing a portfolio of diversified renewable energy royalties including acquiring royalties and other interests directly from project originators, developers, operators, and third-party holders of existing royalties.
fullAddress: 38 Duffy Place, 2nd Floor, Saint Johns, NL, CA
